meanings.definition: The quality of being devoutly religious.
meanings.sent1: Her godliness was evident in her daily prayers and devotion to her faith.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his godliness and commitment to his religious beliefs.
meanings.sent3: Despite his mischievous nature, his godliness shone through during the church service.
meanings.sent4: The aura of godliness surrounding the ancient temple was palpable to all who visited.
meanings.sent5: The old monk's face radiated with a sense of godliness that inspired all who met him.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being morally upright and pious.
meanings.sent1: Her godliness in always helping others without expecting anything in return was truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: The king was known for his godliness and fairness in ruling his kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to mimic the godliness of the wise old cat in the house.
meanings.sent4: The godliness of her actions spoke louder than any words could ever convey.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's godliness in treating all students with kindness left a lasting impact on their lives.
